name: Tread Defender
description:
For Metroidvania Month 15

Controls:

Left / Right: Move

C: Jump

X: Water Gun

Z: Kick (can kick down by holding down)

A: Toggle acid

P/ESC: Pause

M: Mute

Credits:

Python: https://www.python.org/

Pygame: https://www.pygame.org/

Song: https://opengameart.org/content/tower-defense-theme

Sound: https://opengameart.org/content/rage-mode
